courses.name: Introduction to Machine Learning
courses.description: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to machine learning concepts, algorithms, and applications. Students will learn about supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, and practical implementation using Python libraries.

reviews.review: Excellent introduction to ML concepts. The practical assignments were particularly helpful.
reviews.author: Alex M.

reviews.review: Great course content, but assignments can be time-consuming. Professor is very knowledgeable and responsive.
reviews.author: Jamie K.

courses.name: Web Development
courses.description: A comprehensive course covering modern web development technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Node.js. Students will build full-stack web applications and learn industry best practices.

reviews.review: Great hands-on experience with modern web technologies. The final project was challenging but rewarding.
reviews.author: Chris L.

reviews.review: Professor Miller is an excellent instructor who stays updated with current trends. Assignments were practical and relevant to industry needs.
reviews.author: Taylor S.

courses.name: Mobile App Development
courses.description: This course covers mobile application development for iOS and Android platforms. Students will learn native and cross-platform development approaches, UI/UX design principles, and backend integration.

reviews.review: Hands-on experience with both iOS and Android development. Dr. Martinez is incredibly knowledgeable and provides great feedback.
reviews.author: Ryan M.

reviews.review: Great course that balances theory and practice. The group project helped me build a portfolio-worthy app.
reviews.author: Priya S.
